content.html: People criticising the wage asks of public sector workers: You need to remember they’ve had years of real-terms pay cuts going into this. That’s why their situation is so dire. If you clapped them two years ago, support them now. It’s more important.
content.value:
People criticising the wage asks of public sector workers:

You need to remember they’ve had years of real-terms pay cuts going into this.

That’s why their situation is so dire.

If you clapped them two years ago, support them now. It’s more important.
